question: Swami Shraddhanand, who was recently mentioned in the news, is well-known for which of the following works?
explanation: Swami Shraddhanand was born in 1856 and in 1880s, he met Swami Dayanad, the founder of the Arya Samaj. He authored the book “Hindu Sangathan”. Abdul Rashid assassinated him on December 23, 1926.
